definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
inspiration/insight/a burst of creativity in scientific or artistic endeavor
out of order (of machine)/not working properly/a failing (of a system)

sentences.english: My spirit and soul, keep waiting in your heart the door.
sentences.chinese: 我的灵和魂魄，不停守候在妳心门口。

sentences.english: I have cast out demons from a number of people.
sentences.chinese: 我曾奉耶稣名替多人赶邪灵。

sentences.english: The spirit that hovers over the chaos in Genesis 1, that refers to the Holy Spirit.
sentences.chinese: 《创世纪》第一章盘旋在混沌之上的灵，指的是圣灵。

sentences.english: Confessing my sin is good for my health.
sentences.chinese: 向神认罪是对属灵健康有益的。

sentences.english: He was too clever a man to be bluffed.
sentences.chinese: 他是个很灵的人，不会为虚张声势所吓倒。
骄傲，激情，和属灵的软弱。

sentences.english: Now the Spirit of the LORD had departed from Saul, and an evil spirit from the LORD tormented him.
sentences.chinese: 耶和华的灵离开扫罗，有恶魔从耶和华那里来扰乱他。

sentences.english: The lamp of the Lord searches the spirit of a man ; it searches out his inmost being.
sentences.chinese: 人的灵是耶和华的灯，鉴查人的心腹。

sentences.english: Lord God, send a spirit of revival and may it begin in our own hearts.
sentences.chinese: 主神，请赐复兴的灵，并愿它从我们心中开始。

sentences.english: Water is not deep, Long Zeling.
Only believers have the spiritual gift of being blessed.
sentences.chinese: 只有信徒才有这种被祝福的属灵礼物。

sentences.english: So that's why love and faith must be emotional, spiritual twins.
sentences.chinese: 因此，爱和信心是情感与属灵的孪生儿。

sentences.english: There are no unspiritual abilities, just misused ones.
sentences.chinese: 从来没有不属灵的恩赐，只有被误用的恩赐。

sentences.english: How do I find an authorized Breitling dealer?
sentences.chinese: 我怎么才能找到百年灵授权经销商？

sentences.english: He wants you to grow up spiritually and become like Christ.
sentences.chinese: 他想要你在属灵的生命上成长，活出主耶稣的样式。

sentences.english: Deerhounds do not stoop to their work like the Greyhounds.
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰猎鹿犬的工作与灵缇犬不同。

definition: soul/spirit/immortal soul, i.e. that can be detached from the body
soul/mortal soul, i.e. attached to the body
supernatural being (such as a demon, monster, ghost, spirit, gremlin etc)
